title: Celebrity Cruises releases all-inclusive European 2016 sailings with best ever agent rewards
text:
Celebrity Cruises releases all-inclusive European 2016 sailings with best ever agent rewards Celebrity Cruises releases all-inclusive European 2016 sailings with best ever agent rewards Details Category: Cruise   14:45 Throughout August Celebrity Cruises is offering a never-seen-before offer for agents to earn quadruple points on bookings for the newly released all-inclusive pricing on 2016 European sailings as part of the ‘Celebrity Rewards’ progamme. The new all-inclusive offers see agents able to see cruises with up to $2,700 benefits as part of the price such as free drinks, free on-board spend and even free wifi. 
Agents will earn double points for booking inside or ocean view staterooms; triple points for Balcony or Concierge staterooms and - for the first time - quadruple points for Aquaclass or above accommodation categories on sailings to Europe during summer 2016. Itineraries applicable for the offer departing throughout summer 2016 include an 11-night Greece, Turkey and Italy fly/cruise; a ten-night Western Mediterranean fly/cruise; a ten-night Italy and Croatia fly/cruise and a 14-night Scandinavia and Russia cruise-only holiday. The double, triple and quadruple points offers are available to book now, until 31 August 2015. An agent achieving quadruple points on an Aquaclass or suite booking could earn over 18,000 Celebrity Rewards points, enough to claim a designer watch as part of the loyalty programme. Selling two suites is the equivalent points of a brand new top-of-the-range digital camera. Jo Rzymowska, managing director, Celebrity Cruises, UK and Ireland explains: “This is fantastic news for agents across the UK and Ireland. It’s a huge opportunity to boost their Celebrity Rewards account ahead of the 2016 season and we’re sure they will enjoy watching their points accumulate and the gifts roll in. The 2016 season looks very exciting for us with the enhancement of our all-inclusive offer, but we couldn’t do it without the support of our agent partners so we have added this special points booster to say ‘thank you’ for their engagement.” Top offers for 2016 include: • 14 nights Scandinavia and Russia cruise departing Southampton on-board Celebrity Eclipse departing on 3 July 2016 with balcony accommodation from £1,849 per person. Offer is eligible for agents to earn DOUBLE Celebrity Rewards points • 11 night Greece, Turkey and Italy fly/cruise departing on 25 April 2016 on-board Celebrity Reflection with balcony accommodation from £1,649 per person with flights from London Gatwick. Offer is eligible for agents to claim DOUBLE Celebrity Rewards points • 10 night Italy and Croatia fly/cruise departing 9 May 2016 on-board Celebrity Equinox from £1,499 per person for balcony accommodation with flights from London Gatwick. Agents can claim DOUBLE Celebrity Rewards points Celebrity Cruises’ all-inclusive offer sees additional extras – such as alcoholic drinks and wifi – all included in the price. There are more opportunities than ever before to sell Modern Luxury cruises, and earn more points in return. The August 2015 promotion is the first time that Celebrity Cruises has offered quadruple points benefits to agents. Launched in November 2014, Celebrity Rewards is the most comprehensive and generous agent loyalty programme in the travel industry. Offering rewards including cruise holidays, luxury perfume, handbags and even gadgets, Celebrity Rewards has over 5,000 registered agents who have already claimed over 16 million points from their Celebrity Cruises sales.
